entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:30 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 2:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
